text: Sa'an nan a lokacin da ta ji labari game da makircinsu, sai ta aika kiran liyafa zuwa gare su, kuma ta yi tattalin abincin da ake dogara wajen cinsa, kuma ta bai wa kowace É—aya daga cikinsu wuÆ™a, kuma ta ce: "Ka fito a kansu." To, a lokacin da, suka gan shi, suka girmama shi, kuma suka yanyanke hannayensu, kuma suka ce: "Tsarki yana ga Allah! Wannan ba mutum ba ne! Wannan bai zama ba face Mala'ika ne mai daraja
